Battle Mage

The Battle Mage is the Mage's subclass in Remixed Dungeon.

Unlocking

The Battle Mage subclass can be unlocked by using a Tome of Mastery after defeating the second boss (Tengu).

Special Mechanics

When fighting with a wand in his hands, the _Battlemage_ inflicts additional damage equal to the current number of charges. Every successful hit restores 1 charge to this wand if it's below maximum capacity.

Special Armor

Using an Armor Kit on any armor will transform it into the Battle Mage Armor, which is specifically designed for this subclass.

Advantages

  • Additional damage based on wand charges (damage bonus = current charges)
  • Wand charges are restored with each successful hit
  • Provides excellent wand sustainability
  • Synergizes well with all wands
  • Enables effective wand combat in close quarters

Disadvantages

  • Requires using wands to be effective
  • Less effective with melee weapons
  • Wand dependency for the subclass abilities
